mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.billid AS "billid", a.billscsum AS "billscsum", a.settlesum AS "settlesum", a.settletime AS "settletime", a.status AS "status", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.updatetime AS "updatetime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO settlement_bill_info( billid, billscsum, settlesum, settletime, status, remarks, createtime, updatetime ) VALUES ( #{billid}, #{billscsum}, #{settlesum}, #{settletime}, #{status}, #{remarks}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE settlement_bill_info SET billid = #{billid}, billscsum = #{billscsum}, settlesum = #{settlesum}, settletime = #{settletime}, status = #{status}, remarks = #{remarks}, createtime = #{createtime}, updatetime = #{updatetime} WHERE id = #{id}
